# Docs coverage ignore file
# One glob pattern per line, relative to repo root. Blank lines and # comments are ignored.

# Ignore large generated outputs and data
embuild-analyses/**/data/**
embuild-analyses/**/results/**
embuild-analyses/out/**
out/**
.next/**
node_modules/**

# Ignore temporary/test files
**/*.test.*
**/__tests__/**

# Ignore GitHub Actions workflows and unrelated tooling (they are documented elsewhere)
.github/**
